titleStmt.title: George H. Earle III. on the forthcoming antisemitic "Law on the Defense of the Nation" in Bulgaria in 1940

msIdentifier.repository: National Archives and Records Administration II
msIdentifier.collection: RG 59 - Records of the Department of State relating to internal affairs of Bulgaria 1910-1944, Washington 1982 (Microfilm-Edition)

sourceDesc.bibl: National Archives and Records Administration II, Records of the Department of State relating to internal affairs of Bulgaria 1910-1944, Washington 1982 (Microfilm-Edition): Doc. 874.4016/52, p. 1. Original in English.

div.p: The text of the anti-Jewish law ‚Law on the Defense of the Nation‘ passed in its entirety on December 26 has not been published. With only 49000 Jews here of a good class and holding no important government positions there was no Jewish problem. The law is said to be drastic in its terms but a loophole in its strict enforcement may be the fact that rules and regulations for the laws application drawn up by the Minister of the Interior must be approved by the Council of Ministers. I find the Bulgarian people as a whole apathetic about it and a little ashamed.
